findings.title: Minting of unlimited number of sundae tokens
findings.description: The contract allows minting of unlimited number of tokens without any cap or restriction.

findings.title: Unprotected mint function
findings.description: The mint function can be called by anyone, allowing unauthorized users to mint tokens.

findings.title: Unprotected burn function
findings.description: The burn function can be executed by anyone to transfer a specified number of tokens to a burn address without any restrictions or access control.

findings.title: Unprotected finishMinting function
findings.description: The finishMinting function is unprotected and can be called by anyone.

findings.title: Unprotected approve function
findings.description: The approve function allows unlimited approval if it's called without specifying a value.

findings.title: Unprotected increaseAllowance function
findings.description: The increaseAllowance function is unprotected and can lead to unauthorized changes to allowance.

findings.title: Unprotected decreaseAllowance function
findings.description: The decreaseAllowance function does not have sufficient access control or validation, allowing unauthorized users to modify allowance values.
